content: LOT 1: 8x 2017 CryptoImperator HODL coins, silver REDEEMED, all ICG graded**Coins still have holograms intact**STARTING BID PER COIN: 0.0010BTC**This lot will work on a LIFO system as seen in previous auctions**LOT 2: 2022 Whichwich pack: MS68 ICG graded brass coin, flyer, stickerSTARTING BID: 0.0005BTCLOT 3: 2022 Whichwich pack: MS67 ICG graded brass coin, flyer, stickerSTARTING BID: 0.0005BTCLOT 4: 2021 Bitcoin Attacks book #46 + COASTARTING BID: 0.0050BTCLOT 5: 2021 Bitcoin Attacks book #62 + COASTARTING BID: 0.0050BTCOriginal sales thread: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5335343STARTING BID PER LOT: SEE ABOVEMINIMUM BID INCREMENT PER LOT: 0.0001BTC**Please limit bids to ONLY 4 decimal places**END TIME: OCTOBER 27th, 2023, 14:00:00 PDT**Payment due within 24 hours of auction end!!**SNIPE: Any bid made in last 5 minutes PER LOT will extend the auction 5 minutes beyond the ending time PER LOT.If within those 5 extended minutes, a new bid is made, 5 minutes will be added to the auction from the time of that bid PER LOT.PAYMENT: bc1q0mj9njt50045qfuzewc4rut7su7cvg8nt89j3cSHIPPING: Based on location and preferenceOWNER: NOT DISCLOSED
